languages.text: "Какой чуши я только не слышал от приговоренных, но ты теперь на верху списка".

traits.locale_text: "Вам заговаривают зубы, а вы опять ведетесь, господин". {n}Фальш-проктор шепчет, но вы различаете каждое слово.{/n} "Давайте уже их..."
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."
languages.original_text: "Какой чуши я только не слышал от приговоренных, но ты теперь на верху списка".

traits.locale_text: "I have often heard nonsense from convicts, but this rubbish takes the first place."
"I have often heard nonsense from convicts, but this rubbish takes the first place."
"I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."
"I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."
"I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."
"I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

languages.text: “我听过许多犯人临死前胡言乱语，但这个人的胡话最为离谱。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

traits.locale_text: “我听过许多犯人临死前胡言乱语，但这个人的胡话最为离谱。”

languages.text: 「囚人の戯言なら散々聞いてきたが、こんなデタラメは史上最高だ」
languages.original_text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

traits.locale_text: 「囚人の戯言なら散々聞いてきたが、こんなデタラメは史上最高だ」

languages.text: «He oído un sinfín de pamplinas de labios de muchos reclusos, pero esa se lleva la palma».
languages.original_text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

traits.locale_text: «He oído un sinfín de pamplinas de labios de muchos reclusos, pero esa se lleva la palma».

languages.text: "Mahkûmlardan çok zırva işittim ama bundan daha saçma bir şey duymamıştım."
languages.original_text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

traits.locale_text: "Mahkûmlardan çok zırva işittim ama bundan daha saçma bir şey duymamıştım."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu mon lot d'inepties de la part de criminels, mais ces âneries décrochent la timbale. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu mon lot d'inepties de la part de criminels, mais ces âneries décrochent la timbale. »

languages.text: "Ich habe von Verurteilten ja schon viel Unsinn gehört, aber das schlägt dem Fass den Boden aus."
languages.original_text: "I have heard plenty of nonsense spoken by convicts, but that drivel wins first place."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe von Verurteilten ja schon viel Unsinn gehört, aber das schlägt dem Fass den Boden aus."
